meanings: Even cow dung can sometimes be used as medicine

vlive.korean: '같은 방 쓸 때도 저렇게 게임했어요?' "When you shared rooms, did he play games like that too?" 듣기 View video iKON : 잠깐 쉬는시간~!
vlive.english: "When you shared rooms, did he play games like that too?"

vlive.korean: 같은 방 쓸 때 아무리 조용한다고 해도 그거 아시죠? When we were sharing rooms... No matter how quiet you try to be, you know? 듣기 View video iKON : 잠깐 쉬는시간~!
vlive.english: When we were sharing rooms... No matter how quiet you try to be, you know?

vlive.korean: 보통 대본 쓸 때 어떻게 되나? How can they write a script? 듣기 View video AB6IX : 메리 영민스마스🎅🎅❤
vlive.english: How can they write a script?

vlive.korean: 그래 - 쓸 때 너무 힘들지 않아? Okay. - Isn't it hard to write it? 듣기 View video TWICE : [FULL] TWICE SHOWCASE
vlive.english: Okay. - Isn't it hard to write it?

vlive.korean: [권 영어로 쓸 때 K로 쓰나? ] 근데 권 K로 쓰나? [Do you use K for Kwon?] Do you use K for Kwon? 듣기 View video 심포유 - my SMTelevision : [심포유 #첸] EP09 #듀엣곡탐색 #K씨가나타났다 #피피엘아님주의
vlive.english: [Do you use K for Kwon?] Do you use K for Kwon?

examples.korean: Watch how you use those scissors—you could do yourself a mischief! 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 가위 쓸 때 조심해. 잘못하면 다쳐! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: When writing instructions, clarity of statement is the most important thing. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 제품 사용 설명서를 쓸 때에는 표현의 명료성이 가장 중요한 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: No composer was considered worthy of the name until he had written an opera. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 어떤 작곡가도 오페라를 쓸 때까지는 (작곡가라는) 그 이름을 얻을 자격이 없는 것으로 여겨졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: No composer was considered worthy of the name until he had written an opera. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Be careful not to get burnt when using glove warmers. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 손난로를 쓸 때 화상 입지 않도록 조심해. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
